node.title: How to enable Gutenberg block editor for custom post type in WordPress
node.excerpt: Hello Gutenberg! Yes, This is first of my post with Gutenberg! that’s a very good editor for authors and I love them because I got good feeling at first. Enable in post types  For other post types, if you want to enable the Gutenberg, just make sure the show_in_rest argument is true in your post type setting. […]
